definition: Hamlet (name)/the Tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark c. 1601 by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
surname Lei
thunder/mine (weapon)/(Internet slang) terrifying/terrific
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: He perfms Hamlet better than anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他演哈姆雷特比任何人都演得好。

sentences.english: The Dramatic Society are doing 'Hamlet next year.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧社准备明年演出《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.english: The famous actor is now appearing in Hamlet at the Grand Theatre.
sentences.chinese: 这位名演员正在大戏院演出《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.english: The king intended to have Hamlet use a blunt sword.
sentences.chinese: 国王想让哈姆雷特使用一把钝剑。
哈姆雷特替他父亲报了仇。
他正在练习演“哈姆雷特”以便临时代替别人。

sentences.english: While on board the ship, Hamlet asked hilf why he was sent abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在船上的时候，哈姆雷特自问他为什么会送往国外。

sentences.english: Hamlet wanted to avenge himself on〔upon〕 Claudius.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆雷特要向克劳狄斯进行报复。

sentences.english: Hamlet decides to pretend that he is crazy to learn if this is true.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆雷特决定装疯，以探知事情真相。

sentences.english: Come hither, my dear Hamlet, sit by me.
sentences.chinese: 过来，我的好哈姆雷特，坐到我边来。

sentences.english: At the of the play Hamlet avenged his fathers death on the murderer.
sentences.chinese: 剧终时哈姆雷特死凶手，报了父之仇。

sentences.english: The first one is a Hamlet soliloquy.
sentences.chinese: 第一个是《哈姆雷特》的一段独白。

sentences.english: Reading Shakespear"s works, I know how Hamlet looks like."
sentences.chinese: 读莎士比亚”的作品，我知道《哈姆雷特》的样子。

sentences.english: One of the most impressive pieces of writing is Hamlet.
sentences.chinese: 给人印象最深的着作之一就是《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.english: In order to avenge the murder of his father, Hamlet pretended to be insane.
sentences.chinese: 为了报杀父之仇，哈姆雷特假装发疯。

sentences.english: Hamlet was so brave that he jumped onto the pirates' ship and fought against them.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆雷特很勇敢地跳上海盗船跟他们战斗。
